label: ZHC5010
description: FUGA Wall 4-way Switch with LED + Relay

paramInformation.label: Upper paddle buttons mode
paramInformation.description: Pair Mode, upper two buttons

paramInformation.label: Lower paddle buttons mode
paramInformation.description: Pair Mode, upper two buttons

options.label: Status of the built-in relay, inverted indication.
Status of the built-in relay, inverted indication.
Status of the built-in relay, inverted indication.
Status of the built-in relay, inverted indication.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #1 when On
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED # 1, when the LED is turned on.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #2 when On
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED # 2, when the LED is turned on.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #3 when On
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED # 3, when the LED is turned on.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #4 when On
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED #4, when the LED is turned on.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #1 when Off
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED # 1, when the LED is turned off.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #2 when Off
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED # 2, when the LED is turned off.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #3 when Off
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED #3, when the LED is turned off.

paramInformation.label: Percentage of light in the LED #4 when Off
paramInformation.description: Configure the percentage of light in LED #4, when the LED is turned off.

paramInformation.label: Relay mode
paramInformation.description: How built-in relay is controlled

options.label: Relay is activated for one second, button #1
Relay is activated for half a second, button #2
Relay is activated for half a second, button #3
Relay is activated for half a second, button #4
Relay follows the state of button #1
Relay follows the state of button #2
Relay follows the state of button #3
Relay follows the state of button #4
Relay is controlled by commands to root device

paramInformation.label: Indicator mode.
paramInformation.description: set the current light level for the actual LED or the level value can be stored

options.label: Indicator Set used to control the LED.
Indicator Set values and internal activations.

paramInformation.label: Scene notification offset.
paramInformation.description: Scene sequence numbers transmitted by Central Scene notifications.

options.label: Association groups will not be switched.
Association groups will not be switched.
Association groups will not be switched.
Association groups will not be switched.

paramInformation.label: Threshold time for long-press
paramInformation.description: Decides the time for when a button is detected as long-pressed

paramInformation.label: Threshold time for keypress detection of button 1
paramInformation.description: Specifies the detection time for single-press, double-press, etc. for button 1.

paramInformation.label: Threshold time for keypress detection of button 2
paramInformation.description: Specifies the detection time for single-press, double-press, etc. for button 2

paramInformation.label: Threshold time for keypress detection of button 3
paramInformation.description: Specifies the detection time for single-press, double-press, etc. for button 3

paramInformation.label: Threshold time for keypress detection of button 4
paramInformation.description: Specifies the detection time for single-press, double-press, etc. for button 4

paramInformation.label: Non-secure commands for AG in logical device 1
paramInformation.description: Allow sending non-secure commands to association members if added securely

paramInformation.description: Allow sending non-secure commands to association members if added securely

paramInformation.description: Allow sending non-secure commands to association members if added securely

paramInformation.label: Non-secure commands for AG in logical device 4
paramInformation.description: Allow sending non-secure commands to association members if added securely

paramInformation.label: Multilevel Switch (button #1) Disabled/Enabled
paramInformation.description: Multilevel Switch on single press for device 1 (button #1)

paramInformation.label: Multilevel Switch (button #2) Disabled/Enabled
paramInformation.description: Multilevel Switch on single press for device 2 (button #2)
